Package com.kneelawk.knet.api.channel.context

Class RootPlayChannelContext<C,P>

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.knet.api.channel.context.RootPlayChannelContext<C,P>
Type Parameters:
C - the context this supplies.
P - the payload this uses.
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayChannelContext<C>
public class RootPlayChannelContext<C,P> extends Object implements PlayChannelContext<C>
A channel context that supplies a context object but has no parents.
